abstract.t: This document presents an overview of the network architecture and system characteristics of a typical SIGFOX Low Power Wide Area Network (LPWAN), which is in line with the terminology and specifications being defined by the ETSI ERM TG28 LTN group. It is intended to be used as background information by the IETF LPWAN group when defining system requirements of different LPWAN technologies that are suitable to support common IP services.
